#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<list>
#include<vector>
#include<climits>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#define MP make_pair
#define PB push_back
#define LL long long int
#define LD long double
#define D double
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define V vector
#define sd(x) scanf("%d", &x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld", &x)
#define N 100000+10
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int n,k=0;
    int *dp=new int [N];
    cin >> n ;
	while(n--)
	{
		int a , c ;
		cin >> a ;
		c=upper_bound(dp ,dp+k , a)-dp ;
		dp[c]=a ;
		if(k==c)
			k++ ;
	}
	cout << k <<endl ;
}
